Package Extbase\Persistence

Interface summary

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_BackendInterface A persistence backend interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_IteratorInterface An Iterator interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ManagerInterface The Extbase Persistence Manager interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QueryFactoryInterface A persistence query factory interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QueryInterface A persistence query interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QueryResultInterface A persistence query result interface
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QuerySettingsInterface A query settings interface. This interface is NOT part of the FLOW3 API.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RangeIteratorInterface Extends Iterator with the skip, getSize and getPosition methods. The base interface of all type-specific iterators in the JCR and its sub packages.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RepositoryInterface Contract for a repository
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RowInterface A row in the query result table.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RowIteratorInterface Allows easy iteration through a list of Rows with nextRow as well as a skip method inherited from RangeIterator.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettingsInterface TYPO3 Query settings interface. This interfaceis NOT part of the FLOW3 API.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueFactoryInterface The ValueFactory object provides methods for the creation Value objects that can then be used to set properties.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueInterface A generic holder for the value of a property. A Value object can be used without knowing the actual property type (STRING, DOUBLE, BINARY etc.).

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Backend A persistence backend. This backend maps objects to the relational model of the storage backend.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception A generic Persistence exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_IdentityMap An Idetity Map for Domain Objects
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_LazyLoadingProxy
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Manager The Extbase Persistence Manager
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ObjectStorage The storage for objects. It ensures the uniqueness of an object in the storage. It's a remake of the SplObjectStorage introduced in PHP 5.3.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_PropertyType The property types supported by the JCR standard.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Query The Query class used to run queries against the database
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QueryFactory The QueryFactory used to create queries against the storage backend
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QueryResult A QueryResult object. Returned by Query->execute().
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RangeIterator A RangeIterator
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Repository The base repository - will usually be extended by a more concrete repository.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Row A row in the query result table.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_RowIterator Allows easy iteration through a list of Rows with nextRow as well as a skip method inherited from RangeIterator.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Session The persistence session - acts as a Unit of Work for EXCMVC's persistence framework.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettings Query settings. This class is NOT part of the FLOW3 API.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Value A generic holder for the value of a property. A Value object can be used without knowing the actual property type (STRING, DOUBLE, BINARY etc.).
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_ValueFactory A ValueFactory, used to create Value objects.
